mapper.insert: insert into db_financial_products (name, annual_income, pre_income, inves_term, inves_money) values (#{name}, #{annualIncome}, #{preIncome}, #{invesTerm}, #{invesMoney});
mapper.select: select id, name as name, annual_income as annualIncome, pre_income as preIncome, inves_term as invesTerm, inves_money as invesMoney from db_financial_products order by id DESC limit #{page} , #{limit};
select id, name as name, annual_income as annualIncome, pre_income as preIncome, inves_term as inves_term, inves_money as invesMoney from db_financial_products where id = #{loanId}
select id, name as name, annual_income as annualIncome, pre_income as preIncome, inves_term as inves_term, inves_money as invesMoney from db_financial_products order by id DESC;
